title: CaseGlide Secures Funding from Acadian Software
text:
CaseGlide, LLC, a St. Petersburg, Fla.-based provider of legal spend management software, secured funding from Acadian Software, a strategic long-term capital partner for leading vertical software businesses.

The amount of the deal was not disclosed.

Founded in 2015 by Wesley Todd, Chief Executive Officer, CaseGlide provides legal spend management software for property and casualty insurers, third-party claims administrators, and risk management departments.

The company intends to use the capital to accelerate investment in product innovation across its core SaaS offerings in matter management, e-billing/legal bill review and attorney scorecarding.
